column4: How can i remove the password input when i login? Guess its called key ring or something. Ive set my machine to atomaticly login and i dont want to have to type a password for the machine to login on my wireless network. This laptop is only on one/my wireless net so if i want to move my laptop ill just turn off autologin... How to fix this?
go into the keyring manager and set the keyring password to nothing -- i.e. hit return
but then i have to hit return every time?
